means: 权威认可的，审定的，经授权的
授权，批准，委托( authorize的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He authorized me to act for him while he is abroad.
sentence.Network_cn: 他授权我在他出国期间代行他的职务.

sentence.Network_en: I am empowered [ authorized ] to deal with this matter.
sentence.Network_cn: 我 受权 处理此事.

sentence.Network_en: The Central Bank is authorized to sell government bonds on the open market.
sentence.Network_cn: 中央银行获授权公开发行政府债券。

Authorized Version 钦定圣经英译本authorized 认可的authorless 作者不详的

list.abs: 项目管理术语英汉对照表 - MBA智库百科 ... Authority 权威权力 Authorize 批准 Authorized Unpriced Work 批准的未定价工作.
人教版九年级上册英语单词表 ... belong to 属于 author 作家 picnic 野餐.
花语_互动百科 ... 万能（ Almighty） 权威（authority）（ Authority） 白日梦（ Daydream）.
2013年高考英语词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... author n. 作者，作家 authority n. 权力,权威,威信, 官方 automatic a. 自动的，机械的.
那么授权（Authorization）又是什么呢？授权通常是用来回答以下问题：用户A是否被授权访问资源R 用户A是否被授权执行P操作

entry.def: If someone in a position of authority authorizes something, they give their official permission for it to happen.

example.ex: It would certainly be within his power to authorize a police raid like that...
example.tran: 他绝对有权批准那样的一次警方突袭行动。

example.ex: We are willing to authorize the president to use force if necessary.
example.tran: 我们愿意授权总统在必要的时候使用武力。

auth_sentence.content: The fund that subsidizes the coupons has reached its authorized limit.
auth_sentence.res_content: The fund that subsidizes the coupons has reached its authorized limit.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The fund that subsidizes the coupons has reached its authorized limit.

auth_sentence.content: One representative said he wasn't authorized to discuss the issue.
auth_sentence.res_content: One representative said he wasn't authorized to discuss the issue.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One representative said he wasn't authorized to discuss the issue.

auth_sentence.content: Usually, only the central government is authorized to issue bonds.
auth_sentence.res_content: Usually, only the central government is authorized to issue bonds.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Usually, only the central government is authorized to issue bonds.
